about_the_game: Nine college kids gather in a remote cabin to play Dead Body - a murderous spin on Hide & Seek. Brutal murders start piling up when one of them takes the game too far. It's up to the group to figure out who the killer is before a terrifying final showdown. Accusations fly, old grudges resurface, and bodies hit the floor in this classic slasher/whodunit.
detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Nine college kids gather in a remote cabin to play Dead Body - a murderous spin on Hide & Seek. Brutal murders start piling up when one of them takes the game too far. It's up to the group to figure out who the killer is before a terrifying final showdown. Accusations fly, old grudges resurface, and bodies hit the floor in this classic slasher/whodunit.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04 or later, SteamOS 2.20 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
